Speaking

That's what she said.

I'm an international keynote speaker who focuses on accessibility, design systems, performance, and inclusion with a strong call to action for ethical practices.

As I believe speaking is an privilege, I wrote a speaker rider to encourage a more accessible environment for tech's most marginalised and suppressed communities.

If you'd like me to speak at your event, please read the rider to see if it might be a good fit and then email me with the details.
